name: Blue Tokai’s Cup Tasters Championship 2025
description:
Join us for a sensory challenge and the chance to win a relaxing two-day getaway at Bicode Estate, a tranquil coffee plantation, for you and a plus one  
Brought to you in partnership with Benki Brewing Tools and Sangameshwar Coffee Estates, this is a fast-paced contest where every sip counts. Identify the "odd one out" in a lineup featuring carefully selected brews.
The ChallengeIdentify the "odd one out" in a lineup featuring carefully selected brews from Sangameshwar Coffee Estates. It's fast-paced and every sip counts!
Rules and Format☕ Triangular Cupping FormatTaste 8 sets of 3 cups. Two are identical, one is different. Can you pick the odd one out?🔒 Rely on Your SensesNo devices or tools allowed.⏱ Race Against TimeEach round is 5 minutes—stay focused and finish quickly to stay ahead!🎭 Blind TastingNo labels, origins, or roast profiles. It’s just you, your senses, and the coffee.🧴 Maintain HygieneUse sanitised spoons and hands to maintain hygiene.🏅 Rounds & ScoringCompete through the prelims, semifinals, and final round. Earn 1 point for each correct guess. In case of a tie, the fastest taster wins.
Rewards That Await🥇 Grand PrizeA two-day stay at Biccode Estate for two, plus a luxury gift hamper. 🥈 Runner-Up₹5000 worth of shopping on our website, and a curated gift hamper.
Date: 16th February 2025 (Sunday)Time: 11 AM - 4 PM Location: The Pour Room, Koramangala
Please Note: Tickets for this event are non-refundable and cannot be transferred to future events.
